title: FEDARGOS-V1: A Monitoring Architecture for Federated Cloud Computing Infrastructures
Description: Monitoring resources in cloud infrastructure, especially in federated environments, is crucial for managing diverse tenant needs efficiently.

title: Interference Detection Among Secondary Users Deployed in Television Whitespace
Description: TV white space interference affects scalability and service quality, yet existing solutions overlook secondary user interference, prompting our energy-based detection algorithm

title: SecFedIDM-V1: A Secure Federated Intrusion Detection Model with Blockchain and Deep Bidirectional Long Short-Term Memory Network
Description: Despite advances in Intrusion Detection Systems using Deep Learning, security challenges remain, especially in federated cloud setups, driving the need for a Secure Federated Intrusion Detection Model.

title: LogicHouse-v1: a digital game-based learning tool for enhanced teaching of digital electronics in higher education institutions
Description: LogicHouse-v1 is a digital game-based learning tool designed to improve the teaching of digital electronics in higher education.

title: Exploring Fusion of the Face and Voice Modalities Using CNN Features for a Better Performance
Description: The topic explores combining CNN features from face and voice modalities to improve performance.

title: A Genomic Signal Processing-Based Coronavirus Classification Model Using Deep Learning with Web-Based Console
Description: A genomic signal processing-based coronavirus classification model using deep learning, accessible via a web-based console
